commit message: Update dozukify.sh with new package names
Upgrade HoloEverywhere to 1.3.3
Use HoloEverywhere's alert dialog
Convert Dozuki to use HoloEverywhere

Use HoloEverywhere everywhere possible

There are still some issues on older devices (especially with the
gallery) and more views to switch over like ProgressBar.

This still needs more testing.

Login dialog overhaul

The login fragment was coupled to the register form which made it difficult to
make changes to the UI.  This commit splits them up into LoginFragment and
RegisterFragment.

I also switched to the default holo theme button, the other ImageButtons were
too small IMO, but it's up for discussion.
Hide input fields during progress spinner
More uses of HoloEverywhere
Upgrade HoloEverywhere to dev version

Add empty view for sites list.

The styling needs to be updated though.
Reformat site_dialog_list.xml
Bump app to default to 4.2
Minor tweaks to login/register form style
Format xml files

Merge pull request #35 from iFixit/button-style-changes

Login / Register Fragment rework
Fixed small screen dozuki logo image spacing

Add private site login for Dozuki

These changes add private sites to the app.  If the user selects a private
site, they are now prompted to log in.

Still need to test edge cases, but right now this *seems* to work.  Still need
to add a log out option to the action bar, as well as test registration or
disable registration on private sites (not sure what we want to do about that).
Hide register and alt login options on private sites

Replaced icons and other tweaks & fixes

* Replaced action bar icons with some of the android developer icon set
* Added logout menu icon on topic pages for private sites
* Fixed topic display bug for private sites
* Fixed NullPointerException when trying to log into the Media Gallery
* Changed the action bar home back icon to white
Added icon resources
Formatting profiles for AOSP and iFixit coding standards

Merge branch 'dozuki-private-sites'

App/src/com/dozuki/ifixit/topic_view/ui/TopicsActivity.java
Fixed hiding logout menu icon and import bugs
Send session cookie with private site WebView
Parse additional authentication site info
Clear out logs and unnecessary code

Convert RegisterFragment to HoloEverywhere

Also handles showing the LoginFragment using the getInstance() method, which is
much cleaner.

Various small tweaks

* Use site attributes to determine whether to show register button
* Show logout menu item in the TopicViewActivity menu bar and add it's logout handler
Bumped version numbers
